report.title: There's Sass In It
report.author: pan
report.bodytext: After discovering and harvesting large amounts of Sassafrass I attempted to make Safrole tea by gently simmering and mashing 1 pd of fresh sassafras bark. Drank proscribed amount in one shot and wow even in raw tea form this precursor to mdma and mda puts a happy spin on everything for several hours.
